statements: SELECT * FROM CookingTechniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM CookingTechniques WHERE id = 1;
SELECT technique_name FROM CookingTechniques WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM CookingTechniques ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, technique_name, description FROM CookingTechniques WHERE technique_name LIKE '%bake%';
SELECT * FROM CookingTechniques WHERE id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM CookingTechniques WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT id, technique_name, description FROM CookingTechniques WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id ASC, description DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, COUNT(*) AS total_techniques FROM CookingTechniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM CookingTechniques WHERE technique_name LIKE '%grill%' OR description LIKE '%roast%';
